doc.title: Zehirli hayat
doc.plot: Inci, daughter of the rich businessman Hayri Bey, is in love with their driver Dogan. Turan, the manager of Hayri Bey's factory, wants to marry Inci. He sends his mother to Inci's house, to ask for the girl's hand in marriage. Although her mother accepts this offer, Inci rejects it. Turan has Inci followed and Inci's affair with Dogan is revealed, Turan is after Hayri Bey's money. He gets an assassin to kill Hayri Bey as he finds out about his embezzlement and puts the blame on Dogan who is jailed. Inci is pregnant and marries Turan. Dogan escapes from jail, and finds out from Turan's girl friend Meral, that Memo is the murderer. Dogan kidnaps Inci's son. Memo kidnaps the boy from him. Turan kills Memo, but before he confesses everything to the police before he dies. Dogan learns that Omercik is his own son. Turan and Nuri get arrested and the three start a happy new life.
